text: Increased spend without a proportional increase in conversions could be diluting ROAS. This could be due to inefficient bidding or saturation of the target audience.
A change in creative performance (lower CTR or conversion rate) could be driving down ROAS. This could be due to ad fatigue or a less engaging message.
A shift in audience targeting or platform allocation could be impacting ROAS. Perhaps a less responsive audience is now being targeted, or spend has been shifted to a less efficient platform.
External factors, such as increased competition or seasonality, could be affecting overall performance and reducing ROAS.
